title: Uma Musume: Pretty Derby - BNW no Chikai
original_name: ウマ娘 プリティーダービー BNW の誓い
opening_song: "Make Debut!" by Special Week (Azumi Waki), Silence Suzuka (Marika Kouno), Toukai Teio (Machico), Vodka (Ayaka Ohashi), Daiwa Scarlet (Chise Kimura), Gold Ship (Hitomi Ueda), Mejiro McQueen (Saori Oonishi)
sinopse: Special episodes included with the fourth volume of Uma Musume: Pretty Derby Blu-ray release.
